channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for FL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for FL

item.title: Report X-2023110246
item.description:
Report X-2023110246

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-30
  • City: JACKSONVILLE
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A CALL ABOUT A LEAKING PACKAGE IN THE NORTH CENTER. PACKAGE WAS WET ALONG ONE SIDE. UTILIZING THE DECISION TREE/RESPONSE SHEET, THE RESPONDER CONTAINERIZED THE PACKAGE AND TRANSPORTED IT TO THE DMP AREA FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023100914
item.description:
Report X-2023100914

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-07
  • City: POMPANO BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box was found on a pallet outside the HazMat Cage with noticeable signs of past leakage. It was put inside the HazMat Cage using a red tote and HazMat bag. Strangely, the driver marked it delivered from the previous day. DescribePack: The bottom was soaked while the top was stained from previous leakage. Two caps were loose. DurationRel: 14 and MitigateEffect: It was moved into the HazMat Cage using a red tote and a HazMat bag.

item.title: Report X-2023100896
item.description:
Report X-2023100896

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-06
  • City: WEST PALM BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered during the preload sort and was immediately removed from trailer and sent to QA for inspection and to avoid damaging any other packages. DescribePack: it seems during transit the cap loosed due to improper handing resulting in the package slowly leaking until its discovery this moring. (10/6/23) DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: immediately removed from trailer and placed in damage hazmat bin to avoid any further damages or injuries.

item.title: Report X-2023100888
item.description:
Report X-2023100888

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: ORLANDO
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023100888 SequenceEvent: The box was found wet in the load area and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: The cap on one of the jugs in the box was loose, causing contents to leak out. The seal under the cap did not stop the leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright into a hazbag lined tote. 2. X-2023100890 SequenceEvent: The box was found wet in the load area and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: One of the jugs in the box was leaking contents from under the cap, even though the cap was on tight. the seal under the cap did not stop the leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright into a hazmat bag lined tote.

DescribePack: bottom of bottle approximately 1/8 in wide DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: red hazmat tote and absorbent product

item.title: Report X-2023100839
item.description:
Report X-2023100839

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found 1 bottle of Alligare diquat herbicide 2.5 gallon was leaking due to a defective lid. The lid was secured but was still leaking. Shipping label was covering the Corrosive diamond & had no OP-900 on box. DescribePack: Bottle was leaking due to a defective lid. The lid was secured but was still leaking. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023100695
item.description:
Report X-2023100695

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-06
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found 1 bottle of Siemens Sample Probe Cleaner 2.4-liter had small dent & hole at bottom of bottle resulted to leakage & stained contents. Contents corrosive but outer box doesn't have hazmat diamond or OP-900. DescribePack: Bottle had small dent & hole at bottom of bottle resulted to leakage & stained contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: 1 plastic pail of Ecolab Liquid Laundry Sour 5-gallon was found wet. Upon inspection discovered that the small cap on lid was defective. The small cap was secured but was still leaking. DescribePack: Plastic pail had a defective small cap that was leaking liquid content. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023100740
item.description:
Report X-2023100740

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AS THE PACKAGE CAME OUT OF THE TRAILER, THE SUPERVISOR NOTICED THAT THE CARDBOARD OF THE PACKAGE WAS SOILED/DAMP. HE IS A DESINATED RESPONDER. HE STOPPED THE FLOW OF THE PACKAGE AND PLACED IT IN A SPILL TRAY LINED WITH ZEP. RESPONDER TOOK THE PACKAGE TO THE DMP AREA TO BE PROCESSED.

item.title: Report X-2023100554
item.description:
Report X-2023100554

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet. Upon inspection found 1 plastic pail of Denatured Alcohol 5-gal had a defective lid. The small lid of pail had a small hole in the middle that was leaking liquid content. Package had hazmat markings but no OP-900 or certificate to match TRK#. DescribePack: Plastic pail had defective lid that had a small hole in middle of small cap resulted leakage. Outer packaging was improper. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

The lid was secure but was still leaking out of cap. DescribePack: Jerrican had a defective lid resulted to leakage. Cap was secure but was still leaking. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023100584
item.description:
Report X-2023100584

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-29
  • City: DEFUNIAK SPRINGS
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: As pkg. was going down the van line, pkg. fell off due to may pkgs. still on the belt. Pkg. was taken to QA for inspection since it was identified a Hazmat. DescribePack: Upon further inspection, it was noted that 2 of the 4, gallon containers were dented on top causing liquid to leak. Pkg. had a Styrofoam topping but no partitions inside. Damage was cause because of the pkg. falling off the belt, prior to that, contents were in good shape. Orientation arrows were present on the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed in the HWPA awaiting instructions from PGH.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet and leaking during unload. Further inspection found that all caps were unsecured. Liquid contents spilled out in package. DescribePack: Caps were not secured to bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a plastic bag and sealed in 5 gallon drum.
